character.age: 25 years old, but appears to be in his early thirties due to magical aging
character.role: Main Protagonist, Seeker of Lost Knowledge
character.background: Arin was once a member of an esteemed order of scholars and explorers known as the Vexarion's Eye. He lost his way after a catastrophic event forced him to flee. Now he seeks redemption and answers in a world where ancient secrets are being uncovered.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Amber, with a golden ring around the iris when illuminated by moonlight
physical-appearance.hair-color: Sable black, often worn in a ponytail or loose waves down his back
